title: 1935년 Perlman 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Perlman. 판결일: 1935-11-15. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Minnie Perlman and Another v. Jacob J. Alexander
**판결일**: 1935-11-15
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 246 A.D. 586

## 판결문 요약


Order, so far as appealed from denying defendant’s motion for judgment dismissing the first and second causes of action contained in the second amended complaint, unanimously reversed, with twenty dollars costs and disbursements, and the motion granted. No opinion. Present — Martin, P. J., MeAvoy, O’Malley, Townley and Glennon, JJ.
...
